entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain at times mixed with wet snow beginning early in the evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 5:59 PM PST Friday 10 February 2023
